title: [BUG] TypeError when instantiating ComposableTimeSeriesForestClassifier
body:
**Describe the bug**
Following the tutorials for univariate time series classification, encountered a TypeError bug when running the code found in the section on [time series forests](https://www.sktime.org/en/latest/examples/02_classification_univariate.html#Time-series-forest).

TypeError is thrown when instantiating the ComposableTimeSeriesForestClassifier class as per the example code.

**To Reproduce**

```python
from sktime.transformations.panel.summarize import RandomIntervalFeatureExtractor

steps = [
    (
        "extract",
        RandomIntervalFeatureExtractor(n_intervals="sqrt", features=[np.mean, np.std, _slope])
    ),
    ("clf", DecisionTreeClassifier())
]

time_series_tree = Pipeline(steps)

# Fit and evaluate single time series tree
time_series_tree.fit(x_train, y_train)
time_series_tree.score(x_test, `y_test)`

tsf = ComposableTimeSeriesForestClassifier( # This is where the TypeError is thrown
    estimator=time_series_tree,
    n_estimators=100,
    criterion="entropy",
    bootstrap=True,
    oob_score=True,
    random_state=1,
    n_jobs=-1
)

# Fit and obtain oob score
tsf.fit(x_train, y_train)

if tsf.oob_score:
    print(tsf.oob_score_)
```

**Expected behavior**
ComposableTimeSeriesForestClassifier should be instantiable
OR 
Tutorial should be changed to show correct methodology for using time series forests.

**Additional context**
I believe the issue might be related to __init__ being marked as an abstract method [here.](1ec596b9d5464d21ffb0236730afded23/sktime/series_as_features/base/estimators/_ensemble.py#L88)

**Versions**
<details>
System:
    python: 3.8.3 (tags/v3.8.3:6f8c832, May 13 2020, 22:37:02) [MSC v.1924 64 bit (AMD64)]
executable: c:\users\olive\onedrive - university of east anglia\year 3\computing project (cmp-6013y)\datasets\venv\scripts\python.exe
   machine: Windows-10-10.0.22000-SP0

Python dependencies:
          pip: 21.1.2
   setuptools: 57.0.0
      sklearn: 1.0
       sktime: 0.8.0
  statsmodels: 0.13.0
        numpy: 1.19.5
        scipy: 1.7.1
       Cython: 0.29.24
       pandas: 1.3.4
   matplotlib: 3.4.3
       joblib: 1.1.0
        numba: 0.54.1
     pmdarima: 1.8.3
      tsfresh: 0.18.0
</details>
